name: Struggle Critique
description:
Struggle Critique is an overly detailed and complex but shockingly easy text-based game about being a guy trying to buy things in a post-dystopian future where the government makes you post online video reviews for ad revenue. Also everything is ironic. How weird!

Space, F, and Alphanumeric 1, 2, and 3 as directed. Mouse to activate the final text input field. Escape and R will usually exit to to the title/level screen or restart the level.

Writing and programming by Michael "gb_camera" D. @gb_camera / @dennysmenu
Artwork by Sei Yonemoto @seirui and Zero Rose @sakuracilla
Music and sound design by Ryan Cheung @RACerBeats

Made as Project 4 (Final) for CDM 175 @ UC Davis Spring 2022
